nodes.text: The Bloodboilers of Kragis were an organization active at some point between 2022 BBY and 20 BBY. They once unsuccessfully tried to kill the Gen'Dai bounty hunter Durge.

The Bloodboilers of Kragis were mentioned by Durge in the 2005 comic Obsession 2. Years later, Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion established the existence of the Kragis system, but it did not state what its connection, if any, was to the Bloodboilers.
